scripts.install:backend: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing backend dependencies...' && cd AWI/backend && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd AWI/frontend && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building frontend...' && cd AWI/frontend && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Frontend build complete' && ls -la dist/
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting server...' && cd AWI/backend && npm start
